Q: How does Dormdash work for students?
A: Dormdash is a food delivery application that connects students with the restaurants in their city. You can use it to browse restaurants nearby, order food, and have food delivered to you on campus - all for a reasonable price.

Q: Can I order from more than 1 restaurant?
A: No, at the moment you can only order from one restaurant at a time. Feel free to place another order from a different restaurant at any time!

Q: How long will it take for me to get food?
A: You can see estimated delivery times for each restaurant on the restaurant profile. After placing your order, you will see an updated approximate wait time. Your Dormdash deliverer will get your meal to you as soon as possible.

Q: When and where can I use Dormdash?
A: Currently, Dormdash is available in downtown Toronto, with more locations in the future. We are a growing company trying to be accessible to more students everywhere. Stay updated with us on our Twitter page to see where we expand!

Q: Am I expected to leave a tip?
A: Tipping is never required - however you can always add a tip as a thank you for your deliverer. Any and all tips are greatly appreciated by our deliverers, who receive 100% of any tip you decide to leave.
